description: Kotarou represents the Libra. He is the school nurse who had ambitions to become a doctor. Iku`s sister, Yui, had feelings for him, but after her death Kotarou blamed himself for not being able to save her. His father is the chairman of the academy, but after his father`s retirement, the position was given to Kotarou`s sister, Koharu. However, he ended up obtaining the position due to Koharu`s wish to work overseas.
name: Hoshizuki Kotarou
